text: FYI, 2023-10 Monthly Rollup KB5031419 and Security Only KB5031407 contain an update to sppsvc component (C:\Windows\System32\spp\tokens\rules), which add support for ESU MAK addon if your ESU key didn't allow ESU updates installation next month, then you probably need KB5031419 or KB5031407

metadata.email_text_clean: FYI, 2023-10 Monthly Rollup KB5031419 and Security Only KB5031407 contain an update to sppsvc component (C:\Windows\System32\spp\tokens\rules), which add support for ESU MAK addon if your ESU key didn't allow ESU updates installation next month, then you probably need KB5031419 or KB5031407
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] End of support Server 2012
metadata.keywords: ["allow esu update installation next month", "10 monthly rollup kb5031419"]
